text: Holy Shit is an American rock band formed in Los Angeles in the early 2000s. Originally a duo consisting of Matt Fishbeck and Ariel Pink, it has evolved to be essentially a Fishbeck solo project. They have released only two LPs: Stranded at Two Harbors (2006) and Solid Rain (2017). ==Discography== Studio albums * Stranded at Two Harbors (2006) * Solid Rain (2017) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Ariel Pink
title: Holy Shit (band)
